title: ILocalCircularPatternFeatureData.ReleaseSelectionAccess
description: Releases access to the selections for this circular component pattern feature.
remarks:
ILocalCircularPatternFeatureData::AccessSelections
puts the model into a rollback state to allow access to the selections that define this feature.
Use this method to restore the rollback state if you did not modify the feature or use
IFeature::ModifyDefinition
if you did.
